reviewText: I hope now that Amazon.com is showing a listing for customers to let them know how many are waiting for this title that A&E is working on seasons 4 and 5 for release. It has been since 2006 since season 3 came out.

Bought this to finish out the series. My wife and I watch wholesome, moral television shows which are non existent on network television these days.
We enjoyed the first four seasons and are enjoying this season as well.
Excellent family show
wich he had lived to make more of them
Michael Landon can bring the heat.

This is a great family show about an angel trying to do great with an ex-cop.  You see a lot of stars that either already are big stars or soon will be.  The special effects are great for that time.  The acting is good but not great.  There are feel good episodes and make you think episodes.  You will laugh and get sad.  Great for the whole family.  Sadly it ends before we see if the angel earns his wings, but we get a look at the future.
Back when TV was good don't make anything this good anymore
always loved this show. happy with product.
Great buy!

Just fun TV.  Wish there was anything like this on now.  (Gets a little PC, liberal in some shows, but if you ignore that crud its a great series).  I know you'll like this, and can watch it with your kids and grandkids.  Get it!  Thanks, Dave in Colorado
bueno
I just finished Season 3 and am about to watch Season 4.  I love every episode.  They were crafted stories and I always wanted to watch them all in order.
I really enjoyed it, i will add it to my already large collection of movies and series. 70% of which i bought right here on Amazon.

We enjoyed this very much. I had read bad reviews about Season 5 but felt it was equal to the previous 4.  There is always a great message in Highway To Heaven and Little House.  It is unfortunate that we lost Michael and his talent all too soon. RIP
great series.
Alas the final season.  Loved it when it was on tv. Had to have it in our collection. Wish Michael Landon was still with us making great tv & giving us something wholesome to watch again.  Thanks,

I did not enjoy Highway To Heaven Season Five because they did not do A follow up episode of my favorite character which is Scotty as they did in seasons one,two,and three which I enjoy very much!  Overall there were still episodes that I enjoyed!  I am also glad that the character Mark Gorden (Victor French)  lived long enough to finish out season five which he died shortly after season five was made and before it aired on TV!

These final scenarios were politically incorrect - even back then.  Most likely why the series didn't survive.  When Michael Landon chose to use this format to disagree with political and social issues I'm sure he knew that eventually his series wouldn't be renewed.  I found the commentary ahead of it's time in addressing some of the inequities that are around us.  The challenges were the same then as they are now.  Good series with the right amount of focus on challenges we face.
All great and a great message in each one.
Have all seasons love It!
I love Michael Landon but this season was just too preachy and predictable.
This series was different than all the rest I think it could have been better.
This series is very spiritual and powerful.  It brings wonderful stories of loving solutions. These stories bring pleasant and wonderful feelings with offering insights into life.
Highway to Heaven Season 5 is great!  I regret that it is the last season.
Very very good
awesome tv show

I marvel at the genius and brilliance of Michael Landon! i will cherish these episodes. they all have valuable lessons we desperately need to heed in the 21st century as our culture goes down the road of depravity!
So sad that this was the final season.
This is a good show and I like to watch it. Now I've got the whole collection of this show. I'm a fan of Michael Landon ever since I started watching  him on Little House.
perfect
love it
Loved it.  Anything with Michael Landon!
I love it
Great movie

You-know, I suppose it is better than nothing.

Dont expect the same video quality found on the first three seasons.  In season 5, these last 17 episodes are compressed onto only three discs.  The video quality is somewhat badly interlaced and is readily apparent when people or scenes move.
Michael Landon was a true gem. All of his shows were about love and compassion.

Highway To Heaven Season 5 finished out the marvelous Angel series. Michael Landon does a superb job as always as the angel Jonathan. Dack Rambo is a particularly fine guest star also. So happy these are all finally released. Fans of Touched By An Angel will like this too, and lovers of family style entertainment will appreciate this the most.
The Highway to Heaven shows will touch your heart and open your tear glands, in a good way. I highly recommend all seasons. Some shows will make you laugh and cry at the same time.
GREAT MOVIE
to bad this last of the season high way to heaven
Wife stuff - She was really pleased.
Very uplifting series.
Great
good quality
Highway to Heaven Series is terrific family entertainment, always has a message to show how to treat others, we love them all.
In memory of my dad, who died Feb. 22, 2010...Dad, I just noticed,  I'm FINALLY able to order the last two seasons of Highway to Heaven!!!! In memory of you...love you forever!!!
All Highway to Heaven shows were wonderful.  Loved the premise and they were well done and well acted.  Besides, I just like good angel shows!
I'm very pleased with the item I purchased
good movie!
A+ all the way
It is great to finally get the rest of this series.
All was fine. Very good price and shipped fast.
if anyone is a fan of highway to heaven, this should be in your collection, this was and still is a great show
Love the show but a very short season.
Great condition love it
So glad this season was finally made! Everything I thought it would be! Funny, inspiring, serious and clean! And promotes family values. Only problem is that there are only 5 seasons!

When I received this DVD set, I had audio problems with disc 2 in the episode called The Source, I happened to look at the reviews about this set, and saw that Mill Creek Entertainment had took care of the problem they featured in the reviews. So I decided to email Mill Creek and mention to them I had one of the disk that had the audio problem. In just a couple of days I received a free copy of the DVD and I had no problems with it. To me that is fast and satisfying, service. Mill Creek Entertainment Rocks.
now i have all of the seasons
Had great time viewing the last season. Miss Michael and Victor so much. Great quality packaging!
Wonderful stories -- wonderful to watch when one needs a lift in spirit!
very good quality and show so enjoyable.
Just wish Michael had lived longer so he could have made more seasons.

Nice to finally be able to complete this series set with it's final season. This is unfortunately a short set compared to prior seasons because there are only 13 episodes. Victor French passed away I believe in this series final year which is probably why the show ended early. Same quality episodes as in the prior seasons. Michael Landon & Victor French were an exceptional team-up. For sure a very worthwhile purchase.
I found it exactly what I wanted thank you

I really am glad the final season came out.  I really like getting to see all thirteen episodes and being able to complete the series.  I especially like the last episode where Mark learns he will live to at least the year 2018 and both Jonathan and Mark try to change the world on Christmas Eve so that the world will be a place to live in.

From Mill Creek - Regarding the audio issues: From Mill Creek - I reported this: Mill Creek Entertainment We are going to replace the disc with the issue. It will take a few weeks to manufacture. Please contact support@millcreekent.com and they will be able to help you. Thanks!
My Hghway to Heaven is now complete. Just in time to. They recently quit showing reruns in my area..

I now own the complete 5 seasons of Highway to Heaven. My favourite series and I watch them starting from the 1st to the last over and over. It's such a shame that they both had to die so young. One can learn so much by watching the show. I just loved it.

Not in-sync. I am currently watching season 5 of Highway to Heaven and I have noticed that on disc 2, the first episode titled "The Source". Highly disappointed. This should have never been released like this. Love this show. I collect many of the old TV shows and have the previous 4 seasons of Highway to Heaven and never saw an issue like this.
Got the last one. Not lake season 1,or 2 that I have. Could have gotten at Walmart cheaper. Am keeping because I use to watch when I was younger.

The first episode on Disc 2 (The Source) has audio problems.  The audio and video are totally out of synch in the last act of the episode.  I hope that Mill Creek releases a corrected version and makes it available to people who already bought this set.  After waiting so long for the last season of this series to finally be released, this is very disappointing.

1.) ALWAYS read the NEWEST reviews, first (Some of these reviews are from 2008; it wasn't released till 2014).
2.) Only the newest re-release of [from 2014] Season ONE is un-cut.
3.) God Bless[The Boss says 'Hey!']!

Michael Landon and Victor French: True television pioneers.  Highway To Heaven: Filled with messages of hope, love, forgiveness, friendship and kindness and humanity. We really don't see shows like this one much anymore. :) Thank you Mr. Landon and Mr. French for giving us this series. Truly a divine gift to be shared with the entire world. You will never be forgotten. :D
Seasons 1, 2 and 3 were pretty darn good, but I want seadson 4 and 5 to complete my collection.  What's the problem?  I emailed A&E but they never reply.

I RARELY WATCH T.V. ANYMORE DUE TO ALL THE REALITY SHOWS AND SUCH.  I ORDERED HIGHWAY TO HEAVEN SEASONS 1-3 TWO YEARS AGO AND ENJOYED THEM SO MUCH I'VE LENT THEM TO FAMILY AND FRIENDS, WATCHED THEM OVER AGAIN AND WOULD LOVE TO BUY LAST 2 SEASONS.  PLEASE POWERS THAT BE RELEASE OUR BELOVED HIGHWAY TO HEAVEN SEASON 4 AND 5.

I too have been waiting way too long for these. The promised release of Seasons 4 and 5 in Australia never eventuated so I just purchased them from Amazon France on 8 July 2010 at 16.79 Euro a pop (+ postage). This is a big price drop as for months they were 39.99 Euro each. Anyway, this came to a grand total of $78 Aussie dollars for the last two seasons which is probably $5 more each than what they would have cost had they been released here. Oh well, if we have to send our money overseas to get what we want, so be it! Here's to Landon and French...and the French!

I also own seasons 1 through 3 of Highway To Heaven and don't understand why A&E haven't released the 4th and 5th seasons. I WANT THE LAST TWO SEASONS!!!  :) Please, Amazon, if there is anything you can do to convince A&E to release seasons 4 and 5 of Highway on dvd DO IT!!! There are so many of us waiting to complete our collection of this most loved TV show. Even my grandchildren are waiting for seasons 4 & 5. Please help all of us fans to get it. We will pay for it, I promise!!  ;)

(UPDATE - April 8, 2015), The only episode on the "Highway to Heaven: Season Five" 3-disc DVD release from Mill Creek Entertainment
that I'm 100% sure isn't uncut is "The Source".

The longest episode on this 3-disc set is "Hello and Farewell - Part 2" which runs for 49:27.

"Hello and Farewell - Part 1" runs for 47:14, "Whose Trash Is It Anyway?" runs for 47:19 and "The Source" runs for 47:32.

The other nine episodes all run for 48 minutes and change.

Unfortunately, there's an entire 39 second scene that's missing from "The Source" and that scene originally came right before
the part where the character Colin McCormick says "Boy, that Smith ticks me off".
I saw that now deleted scene fully intact via a YouTube upload of that episode.
That now deleted scene showed Michael Landon's character Jonathan Smith while still sitting in a chair by an office table refusing
to allow the two male Santa Luiza High School newspaper reporters Colin McCormick and Doug Rollins to publish the untruthful story
about Dack Rambo's character Larry Nichols.
The final words of that scene came when Colin McCormick told Jonathan Smith "All Right, You Want Hard Facts, We'll Get You Hard Facts".

On this DVD set, the video and audio are completely out of sync during the final 9 minutes of "The Source".

The fifth season aired infrequently on NBC from October 12, 1988 to August 4, 1989.

Notable guest stars from the fifth season of "Highway to Heaven" were Cristina Raines, Dack Rambo, David Spielberg, Haing S. Ngor,
Ken Kercheval, Lew Ayres, Lloyd Bochner, Matthew Perry, Priscilla Barnes, Robert David Hall and Will Estes.

Please get them to release Seasons 4 and 5 of Highway to Heaven.  I can't wait to get them.

love it

Got as a gift.

I grew up watching this TV show way back when I was a kid.  I also bought the Box set, but decided to give that to my friend, as I like the individual seasons instead.  Good wholesome TV show, with good Christian values on how to be a better person by helping others and being there for them.  I Love watching Michael Landon and Victor French.  It does have some humor as with most of these shows that I grew up with when I was a young kid.
I just love them so clear I would buy this movie again...
Great shows

This is the last season. Nice family type entertainment and story lines that are still relevant for the most part. One of the disks was defective but defect was so strange that I wasn't sure that a replacement from amazon would not be the same so I contacted the manufacturer. Excellent customer service, they replaced the individual disk (with a perfect one) and even threw in a gift. Good product and price. Wish they would release the spinoff Promised Land as well.
Awesome
